Chapter One [The three teens]131-the three teens sat on the end of the rickety wooden dock at [the pond]132-the pond . “ Today ’s [my]44-daphne thirteenth birthday , ”[44-daphne] [Daphne Petty]44-daphne told [the boy at [her]44-daphne side]133-the boy at her side , giving [him]133-the boy at her side a coy look and winding a bright red lock of hair around [her]44-daphne finger . “ [You]133-the boy at her side know what that means , right ? ”[44-daphne] “ That it ’s [Audrey]45-audrey ’s birthday , too ? ”[46-cade] [Cade]46-cade glanced around [Daphne]44-daphne ’s shoulder to smile at [the quieter twin]134-the quieter twin . [Audrey]45-audrey gave [him]46-cade a shy smile , flustered that [he]46-cade ’d remembered [her]44-daphne . [She]45-audrey sat on the opposite side of [[her]45-audrey vivacious , flirty twin]135-her vivacious , flirty twin , saying nothing . That was usually how it went . [Daphne]44-daphne commanded attention and [Audrey]45-audrey just sort of stood by [her]44-daphne side . Not that [she]45-audrey minded much . [Daphne]44-daphne was also [the bad twin]136-the bad twin , and [Audrey]45-audrey liked being [the good twin]137-the good twin . [You]138-you got into trouble a lot less when [you]138-you were [the good twin]137-the good twin , and if there was one thing [Audrey]45-audrey hated , it was being in trouble . “ That ’s not it , ”[44-daphne] [Daphne]44-daphne said with a pout . [She]44-daphne nudged [his]46-cade shoulder . “ Pay attention to [me]44-daphne . ”[44-daphne] Instantly , [Cade]46-cade ’s amused gaze went back to [Daphne]44-daphne . “ [I]46-cade am paying attention to [you]44-daphne . ”[46-cade] “ No , [you]46-cade ’re paying attention to [Audrey]45-audrey . Do n’t [you]46-cade like [me]44-daphne , [Cade]46-cade ? ”[44-daphne] [She]44-daphne continued to twist that lock of hair around [her]44-daphne finger , imitating a move [they]140-you ’d seen [[their]140-you older sister]141-their older sister [Gretchen]47-gretchen pull , to great effect . [Gretchen]47-gretchen always had interest from [boys]142-boys , and [Daphne]44-daphne wanted to learn everything [she]44-daphne knew . “ [I]46-cade like both of [you]140-you , ”[46-cade] [Cade]46-cade said in a cheerful voice , then ruffled [Daphne]44-daphne ’s hair like [she]44-daphne was [a child]143-a child . “ [[You]140-you two]1827-you two are [[my]44-daphne friends]1828-my friends . ”[44-daphne] “ [Best friends]1829-best friends , ”[45-audrey] [Audrey]45-audrey said shyly , swinging [her]45-audrey legs . [Guys]1832-guys can only be [boyfriends]1833-boyfriends . ”[44-daphne] [Cade]46-cade choked on a laugh . “ [[You]140-you two]1827-you two are too young for [me]46-cade . [I]46-cade ’m fifteen now . [You]140-you just turned thirteen . ”[46-cade] “ Well , it ’s [my]44-daphne — ”[44-daphne] [she]44-daphne turned to look at [[her]44-daphne twin]144-her twin “ — [our]1827-you two birthday and [you]46-cade need to give [us]1827-you two a present . ”[46-cade] [Cade]46-cade tugged on the frayed collar of [his]46-cade shirt . It was faded and worn , much like everything [he]46-cade owned . [No one]146-no one talked about it , but [the Archers]147-the archers were [the poorest family on [a rather low - end block of [the neighborhood]150-the neighborhood]149-a rather low - end block of the neighborhood]148-the poorest family on a rather low - end block of the neighborhood , [poorer even than [Audrey]45-audrey and [[Daphne]44-daphne ’s parents]152-daphne ’s parents , who worked long hours for little pay]151-poorer even than audrey and daphne ’s parents , who worked long hours for little pay . “ [I]151-poorer even than audrey and daphne ’s parents , who worked long hours for little pay do n’t have money , [Daphne]44-daphne . [I]46-cade do n’t think so . [[You]153-you two]1827-you two are like [[my]46-cade little sisters]1838-my little sisters . ”[46-cade] That was not the first time [he]46-cade ’d referred to [them]153-you as [[his]46-cade little sisters]154-his little sisters . It crushed [Audrey]45-audrey ’s heart a bit , but [she]45-audrey could tell [[her]45-audrey twin]144-her twin was undeterred . [Daphne]44-daphne usually did n’t take no for an answer . “ Maybe just a hug , then ? ”[44-daphne] [Daphne]44-daphne asked sweetly . “ Of course , ”[46-cade] [Cade]46-cade told [her]45-audrey , leaning in and reaching an arm around [Daphne]44-daphne . [[Their]158-their friend]159-their friend . [Cade]46-cade made a noise of surprise and tried to pull away , but [Daphne]44-daphne clung to [him]46-cade like a leech . “ Daph , stop it , ”[45-audrey] [Audrey]45-audrey hissed . Anger began to bubble inside [her]45-audrey . How dare [Daphne]44-daphne make a scene with [Cade]46-cade . It was bad enough that [she]44-daphne monopolized [him]46-cade constantly . “ Just stop it ! ”[44-daphne] But [Daphne]44-daphne did n’t stop . [She]44-daphne made a loud mmmmm in the back of [her]44-daphne throat , just to goad [Audrey]45-audrey . So [Audrey]45-audrey shoved [her]45-audrey twin into [the pond]132-the pond . [Daphne]44-daphne fell with a splash and a yell , and [Cade]46-cade barely managed to scramble backward onto [the dock]161-the dock . [He]46-cade stared at [Audrey]45-audrey in surprise . That was okay , because [Audrey]45-audrey was pretty surprised at [her]45-audrey actions , too . Dang it . There went [her]45-audrey impulsive temper . [Audrey]45-audrey tried to keep it under control , [she]45-audrey really did , but sometimes it got the better of [her]45-audrey . Like right now . When [she]44-daphne continued to flounder in the water , [he]46-cade sighed and looked over at [Audrey]45-audrey , who stood on [the dock]161-the dock , frozen in horror . [She]45-audrey tried so hard to be [the good twin]137-the good twin , [she]45-audrey really did . “ Here , hold this , ”[46-cade] [Cade]46-cade told [her]45-audrey , and pulled off [his]46-cade T - shirt . Then [he]46-cade jumped into [the water]166-the water and grabbed [Daphne]44-daphne , who went into [his]46-cade arms , sobbing , and began to pull [her]44-daphne to [the nearby shore]167-the nearby shore . A moment later , [both of [them]168-both of them]168-both of them were dripping on [the bank of [the shore]170-the shore]169-the bank of the shore . [Audrey]45-audrey still stood on [the dock]161-the dock , clutching [Cade]46-cade ’s shirt and mortified by what [she]45-audrey ’d done . [She]45-audrey ’d pushed [[her]45-audrey twin]144-her twin in , all because [Daphne’d]48-daphne’d been kissing [the boy [Audrey]45-audrey wanted]173-the boy audrey wanted . But it was n’t just [any boy]174-any boy . It was [Cade]46-cade . [Audrey]45-audrey had adored [him]46-cade for what seemed like forever , and [Daphne]44-daphne only wanted [him]46-cade because [Audrey]45-audrey did . That was how it always went . “ [You]46-cade came for [me]44-daphne , ”[44-daphne] [Daphne]44-daphne sobbed , clinging to [Cade]46-cade . “ Of course , ”[46-cade] [he]46-cade soothed . “ [I]46-cade ’ll always come for [you]45-audrey , [Daph]44-daphne . [You]45-audrey know [I]46-cade will . ”[46-cade] It was true . Though two years separated [them]175-them in age , [the three of [them]175-them]176-the three of them had roamed [[their]175-them neighborhood]177-their neighborhood for years , fishing for crawdads , playing in [the pond]132-the pond , and riding [bikes]179-bikes . It never failed that [Daphne]44-daphne would get into some sort of scrape — like the time [she]44-daphne ’d pulled up a manhole and climbed down — and [Cade]46-cade would have to come after [her]44-daphne . [Daphne]44-daphne caused trouble , and [Cade]46-cade rescued [her]44-daphne . And [Audrey]45-audrey stood by , because [she]45-audrey was [the good twin]137-the good twin . Until today , of course , when [Audrey]45-audrey ’s temper got the better of [her]45-audrey , and [she]45-audrey ’d suddenly become [the bad twin]136-the bad twin in a blink . [Daphne]44-daphne wiped streaming hair off [her]44-daphne brow and scowled at [Audrey]45-audrey . “ [I]44-daphne ’m going to [the house]1839-the house and telling [Mom]49-mom . [You]45-audrey ’ll be sorry , [Audrey]45-audrey . ”[44-daphne] [She]44-daphne turned and stomped off , heading back to [the neighborhood]150-the neighborhood . [Audrey]45-audrey sucked in a breath . [She]45-audrey was totally going to be grounded . “ Looks like the birthday celebration ’s going to end early , ”[46-cade] [Cade]46-cade told [her]45-audrey , heading down [the dock]161-the dock and reaching for [his]46-cade shirt . [He]46-cade pulled it over [his]46-cade head and then ran [his]46-cade fingers through [his]46-cade wet hair . “ It ’s okay , ”[45-audrey] [Audrey]45-audrey said . “ [She]49-mom ’ll forgive [me]46-cade . [We]1840-we ’re [twins]1841-twins . [We]1840-we ca n’t stay mad at [each other]1842-each other . ”[46-cade] [Cade]46-cade smiled , reaching out and ruffling [Audrey]45-audrey ’s hair . “ Well , since [you]1840-we ’re [twins]1841-twins , [I]46-cade ca n’t give [one]1844-one a present and not the other , can [I]46-cade ? ”[46-cade] And [he]46-cade leaned in and kissed [her]45-audrey on [her]45-audrey freckled cheek . [Audrey]45-audrey flushed bright red , [her]45-audrey mouth gaping . [Cade]46-cade pulled back , tousled [her]45-audrey hair again , and grinned . “ Happy birthday , [Audrey]45-audrey . ”[46-cade] When [she]45-audrey continued to stand there , [he]46-cade added , “ [You]45-audrey should probably go [home]1845-home and check on [Daph]44-daphne . ”[46-cade] [Audrey]45-audrey nodded , then raced after [Daphne]44-daphne . [Her]45-audrey cheek throbbed in the perfect , perfect spot where [he]46-cade ’d kissed [her]45-audrey . Sure enough , [Audrey]45-audrey was grounded that day . [Daphne]44-daphne had sobbed [her]44-daphne story to [[their]184-their parents]185-their parents , who were appropriately horrified . [Audrey]45-audrey was sent to bed early , without TV or computer while [they]185-their parents let [Daphne]44-daphne stay up late , feasting on birthday cake . [Daphne]44-daphne was upset , and that was almost as bad as getting in trouble on its own . As of that day , [Audrey]45-audrey learned two things . One , that [she]45-audrey was never going to slip up and be [the bad twin]136-the bad twin again . And two , that [she]45-audrey was absolutely , without a doubt , in love with [Cade Archer]46-cade . * * * Twelve years later [Audrey]45-audrey glanced in the bathroom mirror , smoothed a stray lock of hair into [her]45-audrey tight bun , and then straightened [her]45-audrey jacket for the eighth time that morning . Time to approach [the boss]187-the boss . [She]45-audrey left [the bathroom]188-the bathroom , [her]45-audrey nerves tingling with a mixture of dread and wariness . Not that [her]45-audrey outward expression showed it . [She]45-audrey was very good about remaining calm and in control in a stressful situation , and this was definitely a situation . [Her]45-audrey low heels clicking on the marble floors of [[Hawkings Conglomerate]17-hawkings conglomerate ’s headquarters]189-hawkings conglomerate ’s headquarters , [she]45-audrey swept the mail out of the delivery basket and returned to [her]45-audrey desk . Once [she]45-audrey ’d sorted all the envelopes for [Logan]50-logan ’s personal attention , [she]45-audrey rubber - banded the rest and set them into [[her]45-audrey mailbox]190-her mailbox to attend to later . [Her]45-audrey hand paused over the tabloid on [her]45-audrey desk . After a moment ’s indecision , [she]45-audrey folded the magazine in half lengthwise and tucked it under [her]45-audrey arm . Then , with mail in hand , [she]45-audrey headed to [Logan Hawkings]50-logan ’s closed door and rapped twice . “ Enter , ”[50-logan] [he]50-logan called . [She]45-audrey did , [her]45-audrey stomach churning just a bit . [He]50-logan did n’t look up as [she]45-audrey approached , continuing to type on [his]50-logan laptop . As was [their]191-their usual routine , [Audrey]45-audrey moved to [[his]50-logan outbox]192-his outbox and picked up any outgoing memos or faxes that [he]50-logan needed [her]45-audrey to handle . [She]45-audrey slipped [his]50-logan personal mail into [[his]50-logan inbox]193-his inbox , picked up [his]50-logan faxes , and glanced over at [him]50-logan . But [she]45-audrey could n’t make [her]45-audrey mouth form the request . So [she]45-audrey stalled . “ Coffee , [Mr. Hawkings]51-mr. hawkings ? ”[45-audrey] “ Thank [you]50-logan . ”[45-audrey] [She]45-audrey moved to the Keurig machine in [[her]45-audrey adjoining office]194-her adjoining office and brewed [him]50-logan a cup , waiting impatiently for the machine to finish . Once it was done , [she]45-audrey sweetened it , added creamer , and stirred , all the while mentally cursing [herself]45-audrey for not broaching the conversation yet . [She]45-audrey returned to [[his]50-logan office]195-his office with the cup in hand and set it on [his]50-logan desk . Again , [he]50-logan did n’t look up . “ Dry cleaning today , [Mr. Hawkings]51-mr. hawkings ? ”[50-logan] “ No . ”[50-logan] [He]50-logan picked up the mug and gave [her]45-audrey a suspicious look . “ Something wrong ? ”[50-logan] And here [she]45-audrey thought [she]45-audrey ’d hidden it so well . [Audrey]45-audrey clutched the folded tabloid in [her]45-audrey hand , hesitating in front of [his]50-logan desk . “ [I]45-audrey . . . need some time off work . ”[45-audrey] Over [his]50-logan coffee mug , [Logan]50-logan frowned . “ Time off ? ”[50-logan] Just as [she]45-audrey ’d thought , it had n’t gone over well . In the three and a half years since [she]45-audrey ’d been working for [Logan Hawkings]50-logan , [she]45-audrey ’d never missed a day of work . [She]45-audrey was here before [he]50-logan was , left after [he]50-logan did , and took [her]45-audrey vacation time concurrent with [his]50-logan so as not to disrupt [his]50-logan schedule . [She]45-audrey was [the model employee]196-the model employee . [She]45-audrey kept things quiet and running as smoothly as possible for [Mr. Hawkings]51-mr. hawkings . Chapter Four [Audrey]45-audrey set four places at the wooden table , laying down the plates and ignoring the large man who hovered nearby , supervising . “ [You]58-reese ’re so incredibly domestic , [Audrey]45-audrey . At least [he]58-reese ’d listened to [her]45-audrey for once . It had only been a few hours and [he]58-reese was already driving [her]45-audrey crazy . [The man]334-the man seemed determined to make [her]45-audrey lose [her]45-audrey temper . [She]45-audrey wished that [Cade]46-cade had stuck around , but once [he]46-cade ’d unpacked , [he]46-cade ’d taken a walk around [the lake]1943-the lake . [Their]1767-their family name was instantly recognizable , and several of [[their]1767-their houses]1778-their houses landmarks . [He]1572-his father ’d learned long ago to suspect [others]2098-others of ulterior motives . But [Logan]50-logan was incredibly wealthy in [his]50-logan own right . [He]50-logan had no need for [Hunter]64-hunter ’s money . And [Hunter]64-hunter was . . . lonely , though [he]64-hunter would never admit such things to anyone that asked . So [he]1572-his father ’d gone to the meeting , expecting it to be a scam or a joke — or worse , a shakedown . Instead , [he]1572-his father ’d been surprised . [The six men attending]1783-the six men attending had come from all walks of life and had a variety of majors . [Reese Duncan]115-reese duncan was attending college on a scholarship , and [his]115-reese duncan clothes were worn and ill - fitting hand - me - downs . [He]115-reese duncan ’d been ribbed about being a charity case by [the other wealthy students]1784-the other wealthy students , and had gotten into a few fist fights . [Ditto Cade Archer]46-cade , though [he]64-hunter was a favorite on [campus]1761-campus with [his]64-hunter easy , open demeanor and friendly attitude . [[His]64-hunter family]1786-his family did not come from money , and rumor had it that [they]1786-his family were up to [their]1786-his family necks in debt to send [Cade]46-cade to [college]1787-college . [He]1572-his father did recognize [Griffin Verdi]97-griffin , [the only foreigner]1788-the only foreigner . [British and titled]1789-british and titled , [the Verdi family]1790-the verdi family was well connected with the throne and still owned [ancestral lands]1791-ancestral lands . And there was [Jonathan Lynde]116-jonathan lynde , whose family had some wealth , but had lost it all in a business scandal . [It]1792-it was [an eclectic group]1793-an eclectic group to say the least , and [Hunter]64-hunter had been immediately wary . But once [Logan]50-logan had begun to speak , the reality of [their]1794-their gathering came to light : [Logan Hawkings]50-logan wanted to start [a secret society]2526-a secret society . [A brotherhood of business - oriented men that would help each other rise to the top of [[their]1794-their selective fields]1797-their selective fields and assist [one another]1750-one another]1796-a brotherhood of business - oriented men that would help each other rise to the top of their selective fields and assist one another . [He]50-logan believed that [the ones that had power]1799-the ones that had power could use that power to elevate [[their]1799-the ones that had power friends]1800-their friends , and in doing so , could expand upon [their]1799-the ones that had power empire . And [he]50-logan ’d selected [like - minded individuals that [he]50-logan hoped would have the same goals as [him]50-logan]1801-like - minded individuals that he hoped would have the same goals as him . [Hunter]64-hunter had been reluctant at first , since [[his]64-hunter family]1786-his family had the most money of [all of [the attendees]1804-the attendees]1803-all of the attendees . [The others]1967-the others had been equally skeptical , of course . But once [they]1967-the others began to talk , ideas were shared and concepts and strategies born . And [Hunter]64-hunter realized that [these men]1806-these men might not be after [[his]64-hunter family]1786-his family ’s wealth after all , but to make some of [their]1806-these men own . [He]64-hunter ’d joined [[Logan]50-logan ’s secret society]1808-logan ’s secret society . [The Brotherhood]111-the brotherhood was formed , and over the years , [he]64-hunter ’d gone from [no friends]1809-no friends to having [five men that were closer to [him]64-hunter than [brothers]1811-brothers]1810-five men that were closer to him than brothers . And even though years had passed , [they]1967-the others still met weekly ( unless business travel prevented it ) and still caught up with [each other]1842-each other and shared leads . Until tonight , [a woman]331-a woman had never been invited . [The others]1967-the others had been unhappy at [Logan]50-logan ’s invitation to [Brontë]53-brontë , but [Hunter]64-hunter did n’t mind . [He]64-hunter was actually inwardly pleased , though [he]64-hunter ’d shown no outward reaction . [Brontë]53-brontë ’s inclusion into [their]1967-the others secret meant that [she]53-brontë would be around a lot more . And [Brontë]53-brontë was good friends with [[his]64-hunter mysterious redhead]1815-his mysterious redhead — [Gretchen]47-gretchen . This was information that [Hunter]64-hunter could use . And so [he]64-hunter did n’t protest when [Logan]50-logan had brought [her]53-brontë in . [She]53-brontë ’d given [him]64-hunter plenty of information , too . [[His]64-hunter [Gretchen]47-gretchen]1816-his gretchen was [a writer]1817-a writer . [A ghost writer]2733-a ghost writer . There had to be a way to get in contact with [her]53-brontë . Spend time with [her]53-brontë without arousing [her]53-brontë suspicions . [He]64-hunter simply wanted to be around [her]53-brontë . To have a conversation with [her]53-brontë . To enjoy [her]53-brontë presence . Of course [he]64-hunter wanted more , but [a man like [him]64-hunter]1819-a man like him knew [his]64-hunter limits . [He]64-hunter knew [his]64-hunter face was unpleasant . [He]64-hunter ’d seen [women]1982-women clutch [their]1982-women mouths at the sight of [him]64-hunter . [He]64-hunter ’d never have [someone like [Gretchen]47-gretchen]1821-someone like gretchen — smart , beautiful , funny — unless [she]53-brontë was interested in [his]64-hunter money . And the thought of that repulsed [him]64-hunter . [He]64-hunter ’d take friendship with [a beautiful woman]1822-a beautiful woman , if friendship was all [he]64-hunter could have .

[Jessica Clare]40-jessica clare also writes as [Jill Myles]117-jill myles and [Jessica Sims]118-jessica sims . As [Jessica Clare]40-jessica clare , [she]40-jessica clare writes sexy contemporary romance .
